casebody.data:
Walter S. GRIFFIN, Petitioner-Appellant, v. STATE OF MISSISSIPPI, Respondent-Appellee. No. 29834

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 25, 1970. *169Samuel H. Wilkins, Wilkins & Ellington, Jackson, Miss., for petitioner-appellant. A. F. Summer, Atty. Gen., Guy N. Rogers, Asst. Atty. Gen., by Timmie Hancock, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, Miss., for respondent-appellee.

Before . BELL, AINSWORTH and GODBOLD, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1 See also: Boring v. Mississippi, 431 F.2d 484 [5th Cir., 1970].

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir., 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
